title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4207.4 - Administrative fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4207.4 - Administrative fee

State Regulations

The UDC shall assess an administrative fee of up to 1.5
percent of the project loan payable by the borrower at closing. The UDC may
allocate the administrative fee to cover project-related expenses it deems
appropriate. In addition, the borrower will be obligated to pay for all
expenses related to the project loan, including but not limited to expenses
related to appraisals, surveys, title insurance and other requirements deemed
appropriate by the UDC. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
